Name: Pray for Death
About the game: '...he decided to open the contest right up to creatures who had long since been reaped. And so it came to pass that the greatest competition ever was scheduled...' Through time and space, the finest warriors in creation have gathered together for the ultimate showdown. At the behest of Death himself, angel will fight demon, wizard will fight warlord, robot will fight human. The creature that triumphs in this awesome battle will be rewarded with that most precious of commodities - life itself. Pray for Death features an awesome line-up of characters, each with a selection of unique talents and special moves. Every character has been carefully animated and the matches themselves take place in chilling underground battlegrounds. Will you triumph over the odds and beat Death at his own game, or will you get crushed underfoot and pray for death? Three local multiplayer modes to choose from. Tournament, Double Death, and Final League will give an opportunity to challenge your friends! Choose between 10 different characters including mighty Cthulhu himself Master each warrior's special moves and combos
